q1.answer:
SELECT Customer.cid FROM Customer JOIN Deposit ON Customer.cid = Deposit.cid JOIN LOAN ON Customer.cid = Loan.cid JOIN branch ON Branch.bid = Deposit.bid
WHERE Deposit.bid = Loan.bid AND Branch.city = Customer.city;

q2.answer: SELECT bid FROM branch WHERE assets >= (SELECT AVG(assets) FROM branch WHERE city = "Edmonton");

q3.answer: SELECT COUNT(cid) AS TotalCustomers FROM (SELECT cid FROM customer NATURAL JOIN deposit EXCEPT SELECT cid FROM customer NATURAL JOIN loan);
